scripts.dev: yarn zx scripts/compile-mitosis.mjs vue src/components/**/*.jsx && concurrently --kill-others "yarn mitosis:watch" "yarn tailwind:watch"
scripts.mitosis:watch: chokidar "src/components/**/*.jsx" -c "if [ '{event}' = 'change' ] || [ '{event}' = 'add' ]; then yarn zx scripts/compile-mitosis.mjs vue {path}; fi;"
